post.body: Hey guys. I'm new to ZeroNet. I think it's really fun. I am currently running 2 machines with ZeroNet. 1 dedicated to helping the network grow, and one for everyday use. (Won't be active all day.) It's nice to meet you all. I will be sharing my massive library on ZeroUp Unlimited.

Pretty much how bored I am. I think it's time for slZZZp. After work I'll upload a shit load more games to ZeroUp Unlimited. Don't be shy. Hit me up. Chances are you're not as alone as you might think.
God Dammit. I don't speak ramen noodles. Why titles in English and then all the rest in Mandarin? lol

Uploading all I can to ZeroUp Unlimited...

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1CiXRY9ATZSoZqBzwMfXEMsKtPRt2aQoF2/

comment.body: @SSDifnskdjfnsdjk: It does indeed have its limits. However, have you discovered the trick to drag the top right circle to the left? There is a bunch of info in the tab that pops up, and you can set the the site to help download and distribute all content.
